com.fluidops.iwb.util

Class OracleSPARQLConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openrdf.repository.base.RepositoryConnectionBase
      • org.openrdf.repository.sparql.SPARQLConnection
        • com.fluidops.iwb.util.OracleSPARQLConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryConnection

    public class OracleSPARQLConnection
extends org.openrdf.repository.sparql.SPARQLConnection
    This SPARQLConnection ignores context information because the Joseki SPARQL endpoint used for Oracle doesn't support named graphs in the FROM clause.
    Author:
    christian.huetter
